answers.answer: HiShould I be worried at all?Very, very unlikely to get anything this way.Was it a bad idea to look in the container with out touching?How could looking in a container possibly cause you any harm?I don't know much about hepatitis, is there tests I can take?Yes there are for hepatitis B and C whuich are both blood borne virus.What is the window period?Hep C can be tested with 97% accuracy after 6 months.HBsAg will be detected in an infected person’s blood an average of 4 weeks (range: 1–9 weeks) after exposure to the virus. About 1 of 2 patients will no longer be infectious by 7 weeks after onset of symptoms, and all patients who do not remain chronically infected will be HBsAg-negative by 15 weeks after onset of symptoms.Is it bad brushing up on this box?I probably wouldn't recommend doing it on purpose but no.Hep C FAQ for the general public from the CDChttp://www.cdc.gov/hepatitis/c/cfaq.htmHep B FAQ for the general public from the CDChttp://www.cdc.gov/hepatitis/b/bfaq.htmgood luckLynn

question: My work which, is not a hospital, had a sharps container in the bathroom. After urinating I turned around and my elbow ran into the container. It wasn't the typical rectangular one it was more milk jug shaped with a wide open mouth you could look into. Like this:https://www.newmedsupplies.com/mobile/Sharps-Disposal-By-Mail-System_p_17598.htmlI wanted to check if there was anything to worry about. I examined my elbow and didn't notice or feel any stick. I do have rough elbows and I had a bug bite which started bleeding after I washed it.  Like i said I didn't see any open wound, but later in the day I was picking at my elbow and it did bleed slightly possible scab..   Looking in the box I didn't see any needles. There were razor blades and some small what I assume we're diabetes lancets.Should I be worried at all. Was it a bad idea to look in the container with out touching. I didn't see any blood I am just worried sick.  This is like an 8 on my things I would want to avoid :(I don't know much about hepatitis, is there tests I can take? What is the window period. Is it bad brushing up on this box
title: bumped into sharps container.
